attributes.action: Bring back the dog licence for responsible dog owners.
attributes.additional_details:
To stop irresponsible people owning dogs for their image or egos. 
Many dog lovers treat their pets like part of the family, they are trained and loved. It’s the small minority that don’t, which then results in the poor animal being euthanised when it does something which it doesn’t know is right or wrong.
Why should a dog lose its life early, just because of the owners actions??
attributes.background: Bring back the dog licence for responsible dog owners, so image seekers cannot have them for the look. No interest in training or loving them. Resulting in the dog doing wrong and losing their life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Introduce licences, mandatory training and annual vet visits to own a dog:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643739

Bring back a Dog Licence: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
